Detailed Description

Class that contains all loaded images.

File: loadimage.h

Description: Header for image loading. Contains a class that handles loading and storage of images

(c)2009, by Raymond Loeberg

Checks if a specific image is loaded

Returns:

Retrieves an image from the database, loading it if not already there.

Returns:
